thread.title: Momentous Entertainment Group Appoints Peter Bianchi EVP of Consumer Products

author: cnbc.com
title: Momentous Entertainment Group Appoints Peter Bianchi EVP of Consumer Products
text:
LAS VEGAS, NV., April 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Momentous Entertainment Group, Inc. (“Momentous”) (OTCBB:MMEG), announced the appointment of Peter Bianchi to the role of Executive Vice President of Consumer Products. Mr. Bianchi will be working within the current family of MEG e-commerce products to enhance brand value and increase sales. His priority is to focus on developing additional e-commerce products that will integrate with our current portfolio of products, as well as future strategic acquisitions. He will also spearhead several newly targeted companies for future mergers.
Momentous CEO Kurt Neubauer stated, “Momentous is excited to have Mr. Bianchi join the Company. Peter’s combined knowledge and leadership qualities will allow Momentous to add new and exciting products to MEG's existing product base.” Mr. Neubauer also stated, “Mr. Bianchi’s entrepreneurial spirit will fit in perfectly with the existing Momentous management team.”
Mr. Bianchi stated, ”I believe in Mr. Neubauer’s vision for MEG. He has created a company that focuses primarily on two sectors, e-commerce and gaming, with both offering tangible consumer products. With the upcoming acquisition of Ignis Studios, combined with the current Chimera Game assets we’ll be able to use our in-game advertising marketing platform, to offer additional new brands and products to maximize user revenue. I have already identified several new e-commerce products that will be a perfect fit for marketing through our gaming division. We will be working aggressively to create and release these products to our gaming users as well as e-commerce consumers.”
Mr. Bianchi brings more than 20 years of senior management and finance leadership expertise to Momentous. He successfully spearheaded more than $100MM in sales over 12 years as the Founder and CEO of a publicly traded beverage company and has been recognized by notable media giants, including ABC Nightline, PBS and Good Morning America, for exhibiting a history of success in developing industry-changing categories from brand conception to explosive sales.
Peter has a proven ability to enact change, deliver strong leadership, and is highly acclaimed for creativity in product development, branding, advertising and trademarks.
Prior to joining Momentous, Mr. Bianchi held the position of Founder and Chief Operating Officer of Unique Growing Solutions, a manufacturing and consulting company providing turnkey solutions to the natural and organic food industry and the emerging cannabis sector. He was also the Founder of Innovative Beverage Group Holdings, a distributor for national brands including Fiji Water, Jolt, Rock Star, Crystal Geyser, Sweet Leaf Tea and Arizona Ice Tea and spearheaded product development and implementation locally, regionally and internationally as the creator and international spokesperson for the widely successful beverage Drank(TM) and many other national brands.
Prior to that Mr. Bianchi worked for Morgan Stanley as a broker and Institutional Trade Specialist.
About Momentous Entertainment Group (MMEG)
Momentous Entertainment Group, Inc. (MMEG) is a social media gaming, ecommerce and digital media company focused on providing unique and entertaining experiences for its subscribers and members on a global scale.
The Company’s strategic expansion plans are balanced between accelerating growth of its existing media and gaming properties, to the acquisition of profitable and sustainable businesses that are highly complementary to MMEG’s operations.
